name: netapp-ontap
label: NetApp ONTAP
description: ONTAP helps you create a storage infrastructure that reduces costs, accelerates critical workloads, and protects and secures data across your hybrid multicloud.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL or host of the NetApp ONTAP server to which you connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Username to access the NetApp ONTAP server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Password used to access the NetApp ONTAP server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Security Accounts
operations.description: Retrieves a list of user accounts in the cluster from NetApp ONTAP based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated fields to return from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: max_records
parameters.description: Limit the number of records to be returned from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Return Records
parameters.name: return_records
parameters.description: The default is true for GET calls. When set to false, only the number of records is returned from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Return Timeout
parameters.name: return_timeout
parameters.description: The number of seconds to allow the call to execute before returning. When iterating over a collection, the default is 15 seconds. ONTAP returns earlier if either max records or the end of the collection is reached.

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Order results by specified fields and optional [asc|desc] direction. Default direction is ‘asc’ for ascending.

operations.title: Get Security Audit Messages
operations.description: Retrieves the administrative audit log viewer from NetApp ONTAP based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Timestamp
parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Specify the timestamp of the audit log to be fetched from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State of the audit log that you want to fetch from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Application
parameters.name: application
parameters.description: Application of the audit log that you want to fetch from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Session ID
parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Session ID of the audit log that you want to fetch from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Scope
parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope of the audit log that you want to fetch from NetApp ONTAP. e.g. svm, cluster.

parameters.title: Command ID
parameters.name: command_id
parameters.description: Command ID of the audit log that you want to fetch from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Index
parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index of the audit log that you want to fetch from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Location
parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location of the audit log that you want to fetch from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify the fields to return from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: max_records
parameters.description: Limit the number of records to be returned from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Return Records
parameters.name: return_records
parameters.description: The default is true for GET calls. When set to false, only the number of records is returned from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Return Timeout
parameters.name: return_timeout
parameters.description: The number of seconds to allow the call to execute before returning. When iterating over a collection, the default is 15 seconds. ONTAP returns earlier if either max records or the end of the collection is reached.

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Order results by specified fields and optional [asc|desc] direction. Default direction is ‘asc’ for ascending.

operations.title: Get Security Roles
operations.description: Retrieves a list of roles configured in the cluster from NetApp ONTAP based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Fields
parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify the fields to return from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: max_records
parameters.description: Limit the number of records to be returned from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Return Records
parameters.name: return_records
parameters.description: The default is true for GET calls. When set to false, only the number of records is returned from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Return Timeout
parameters.name: return_timeout
parameters.description: The number of seconds to allow the call to execute before returning. When iterating over a collection, the default is 15 seconds. ONTAP returns earlier if either max records or the end of the collection is reached.

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Order results by specified fields and optional [asc|desc] direction. Default direction is ‘asc’ for ascending.

operations.title: Update User Password
operations.description: Updates the password for a user account in NetApp ONTAP based on the username and password you have specified.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: User account name whose password you need to chnage in NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Password
parameters.name: max_records
parameters.description: Limit the number of records to be returned from NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Owner Name
parameters.name: owner_name
parameters.description: Name of the SVM for an SVM-scoped user account in NetApp ONTAP.

parameters.title: Owner UUID
parameters.name: owner_uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the SVM for an SVM-scoped user account in NetApp ONTAP.
